CustomField.description: This field is populated with the current date and time as soon as the Status field is set to "On Hold (Pending User Input)" The amount of time tracked by this field is cumulatively tracked in the "Total Business Hours On Hold" field.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is populated with the current date and time as soon as the Status field is set to "On Hold (Pending User Input)" The amount of time tracked by this field is cumulatively tracked in the "Total Business Hours On Hold" field.
CustomField.label: On Hold Since
